Text:
i have been waiting for this album...

thanks a lot uploader...

Thanks!

Although a few of the songs are unfortunately cut of just a little bit too early in the end, so not the full song is there, not a big problem on most, just "you're out of my life" is it a bit disturbeing onm when the last beautiful note just cuts of almost when it starts! :/

Dont think you could change that song to a bette, and also the other few with the same problem? Would be great!

Thanks!
I agree, I love Out of My Light, but I want to bang my head to the wall with the ending note, it was cut too early... plz amend, it would be very appreciated...

Could you please rerip those, at leas out of my life, can't find a full one!

Thank you!
